title: Content Management
noReviewsMessage: Guest reviews will appear here once they leave feedback about your properties.
noBookingsMessage: Bookings will appear here when guests make reservations.
noGuestDataMessage: Guest information will appear here once you receive bookings.
noMessagesMessage: You haven't received any messages from the platform administrator yet.
financialDataMessage: Your financial data and transaction history will appear here once you have bookings.
welcomeMessage: Thank you for registering as a hotel partner. To get started, add your first property using the "Add Property" option below.
addPropertyDescription: Register a new hotel or apartment.
